comments.author: delfastTions
comments.body: I also see no reason to use ethereum when bitcoin is more widespread and there is a working LN network in which commissions are generally minimal, and the transaction speed is high.  Ethereum is also bad in that it will have a transition from PoW to PoS and how it will go through is unknown.  But also the issue with Ethereum commissions remains open.  It is not clear whether they will be normal for most players when the cryptocurrency market goes into a bullish stage.  Summer 2021 showed that there may be unacceptable commissions.  And then it will be impossible to play at all.  So it's better in my opinion bitcoin

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: The successful casinos are not concentrated on a single Alt coin or token, because they know they have to cater for a broad range of Crypto owners. The different Alt coins are used for different reasons, for example.... people will use "stable coins" ...if they want more stability in the price. (Your balance will not drop drastically with volatility) or they will use coins like Litecoin or TRX with faster confirmation times for their deposits. There are reasons why you would want to use Ethereum for Smart contracts for specific types of casinos, but the most common practice is to cater for lots of Alt coins.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Ethereum casinos usually have these unique games that does not appear on any bitcoin casinos. However the downside is that you'll have to shell out a huge amount just for fees. Also, usually these games are under maintenance, or may have lower prize pots because a lot of the attention are on the common casino games which can be found on bitcoin casinos. If I have the chance, I'll try using ethereum casinos, but for the most part, I'll stick with bitcoin ones and enjoy the freedom and bonuses that I get from the regular platforms that I am on.
